answers.answer: Hello and welcome to the medhelp forum. Your symptoms could be non specific and point towards various etiologies. Weight gain itself could cause dizziness and weakness in lower limbs. Dehydration, anemia, hormonal imbalance including diabetes, electrolyte disturbances could cause fatigue in legs. Cervical disc degenerative disease needs to be checked for since disc prolapse in neck can cause dizziness and lumbar nerve root compression in case of canal stenosis.  You need to consult a physician for detailed evaluation including complete metabolic panel check with B12 and Vitamin D levels. These should give direction to the diagnosis. Wishing you good luck.
